	Organizational skills and ability to meet deadlines Data-driven.

B2B Sales and Marketing Officer Job at Qualiserve Group




        
    

        
        Qualiserve Technology is an IT consulting firm renowned for its dedication to delivering innovative solutions to businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: B2B Sales and Marketing Officer
Job Location: Lekki-Ajah, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Details


	We are seeking an experienced B2B Sales & Marketing Officer to drive the growth and expansion of its services.
	The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in B2B sales, IT expertise, and excellent communication skills.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Identify and pursue new business opportunities in target markets while nurturing existing relationships.
	Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve business objectives and revenue targets.
	Manage the entire sales life cycle: prospecting, pitching, proposal writing, negotiations, and closing.
	Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers in prospective and existing client organizations.
	Respond to RFPs, prepare tailored proposals, and work closely with technical teams for solution design.
	Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.
	Maintain up-to-date CRM records of leads, contacts, and sales activity.
	Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and client meetings.


Requirements


	B.Sc. in Business, Marketing, IT, or a related field.
	2 - 3 years of B2B sales experience with a proven record in IT or IT consulting.
	Proficiency in CRM tools and the Microsoft Office suite.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Client-centric and collaborative relationship building.
	Organizational skills and ability to meet deadlines Data-driven.


Salary
N150,000 - N200,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: careers@qualiservegroup.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Cashier / Inventory Officer Job at Salpha Energy Limited




        
    

        
        Salpha Energy - Founded in 2017, Salpha is a leading off-grid solar energy company, delivering clean, affordable, and reliable energy to households and businesses across Nigeria. Salpha has reached over 2 million people, providing transformative solar solutions ranging from solar home systems to productive-use appliances. The company’s mission is to end energy poverty by building the world’s most customer-centric energy business, accelerating progress toward universal access to affordable, reliable, and sustainable energy (SDG7).

Salpha combines technology innovation, financing solutions, and local partnerships to empower underserved communities with access to clean energy, improved livelihoods, and climate resilience.
     

            
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier / Inventory Officer

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Cashier shall have the primary responsibility of handling customer purchasing and payments while facilitating a good interaction/relationship with the customer.
	The ideal candidate shall be responsible for processing and receiving payments and issuing receipts.
	The cashier will be entrusted with the key responsibilities of complementing the customer shopping experience by evaluating the customer’s purchases, and handling the customers’ payments for goods and services while making the process as enjoyable and least stressful as possible.


Responsibilities


	Assist in achieving branch budgeted sales and profit targets.
	Collecting payments for products either in cash or credit.
	Maintain clean and tidy of the checkout stations and other equipment.
	Balancing the cash register and generating reports for credit and debit sales
	Accepting payments, ensuring all prices and quantities are accurate and providing a receipt to every customer
	Deposit cash received to the bank
	Track transactions on balance sheets and report any discrepancies.
	Maintain accurate record of inventory sent to the station.
	Resolving customers’ complaints.
	Ensure products presented by customers are properly handled to the satisfaction of the customer.
	Cross-checking items presented for purchase by customers to see that they are in good condition.
	Scanning all the items presented for purchase by the customer.
	Have proper knowledge of all companies’ products and prices.
	Processing various forms of tender e.g. cash, cheques, debit cards, and gift vouchers presented by the customer as means of payment.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting / Business Administration / Marketing / Economics or any relevant field with 3 - 5 years of experience.
	Computer Savvy.
	Excellent knowledge of Google Suites.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Prioritizing, time management and organizational skills.
	Relationship management skills and openness to feedback.
	Proven experience as a cashier is an added advantage.
	Candidates must reside in the job location.


Salary
N100,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: salpha@salphaenergy.com using the Job Position and Location as the subject of the email.
